00009 #import "WIRemoting.h"

00011 @interface RMCall (Private)
00012 - (void)responseDone:(RMResponse*) response;
00013 @end
00014 
00015 @implementation RMResponse
00016 
00017 
00018 + (id)responseWithCall:(RMCall*) call
00019                request:(ASIHTTPRequest*) request
00020               delegate:(id<RMResultDelegate>) delegate
00021 {
00022   return [[[RMResponse alloc]
00023            initWithCall:call request:request delegate:delegate] autorelease];
00024 }
00025 
00026 - (id)initWithCall:(RMCall*) call
00027            request:(ASIHTTPRequest*) req
00028           delegate:(id<RMResultDelegate>) aDelegate
00029 {
00030   self = [super init];
00031   
00032   if (nil != self) {
00033     parentCall = call;
00034     request = [req retain];
00035     delegate = aDelegate;
00036   }
00037   
00038   return self;
00039 }
00040 
00041 - (void)dealloc
00042 {
00043   [string release];
00044   [data release];
00045   [super dealloc];
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (void)requestFinished:(ASIHTTPRequest*) req
00049 {
00050   // get the response
00051   string = [[NSString alloc] initWithString:[req responseString]];
00052   data = [[NSData alloc] initWithData:[req responseData]];
00053   
00054   // call the delegate for successful call
00055   [delegate finished:self];
00056   
00057   // tell the parent call the response is done
00058   [parentCall responseDone:self];
00059 }
00060 
00061 - (void)requestFailed:(ASIHTTPRequest*) req
00062 {
00063   // get the response
00064   string = [[NSString alloc] initWithString:[req responseString]];
00065   data = [[NSData alloc] initWithData:[req responseData]];
00066   NSError *error = [req error];
00067   
00068   // call the delegate for failed call
00069   [delegate failed:self
00070                  error:error];
00071   
00072   // tell the parent call the response is done
00073   [parentCall responseDone:self];
00074 }
00075 
00076 - (NSString*) responseString
00077 {
00078   return string;
00079 }
00080 
00081 - (NSData*) responseData
00082 {
00083   return data;
00084 }
00085 
00086 @end
